title: Tales of terror
creator_credit: Roger Corman and Alta Vista Productions
brief_description: Presented on this tape are three classic tales from the master of mystery and imagination, Edgar Allan Poe, featuring Vincent Price, Peter Lorre and Basil Rathbone. MORELLA; A tormented spirit raises from the dead to seek revenge; THE BLACK CAT; A jealous husband is pursued by a black cat after he entombs his unfaithful wife and her lover; THE CASE OF M. VALDEMAR; A dying man and a crazed doctor become involved in an experiment to delay death. Also starring Debra Paget.
